Rows.Default_Comments: Valid values are Create and Create records
Rows.Report_Where_Criteria: LookupType in ('ORA_WIS_WD_IMP_HEADER_ACTION', 'IMPORT_MODE') AND LookupCode in ('CREATE','CREATE_ONLY') AND ViewApplicationId=0

Rows.Notes: id from create, for submit and delete requisitionProcessingRequests
Rows.Designer_Description: Value that uniquely identifies the requisition
Business unit that manages and owns the requisition and corresponding purchase order or a negotiation
Rows.Report_SQL:
SELECT
  BusinessUnitUsage.MODULE_ID,
  BusinessUnit.BU_ID,
  BusinessUnit.BU_NAME AS PROCUREMENT_BU,
  BusinessUnit.DEFAULT_CURRENCY_CODE,
  people.list_name DEFAULT_BUYER,
  PLT.line_type_id DEFAULT_LINE_TYPE_ID,
  PLT.line_type DEFAULT_LINE_TYPE,
  TermsInfo.name PAYMENT_TERMS,
  ParCarriers.party_name SHIPPING_METHOD,
  FreightTerms.meaning FREIGHT_TERM,
  Fob.meaning FOB_OPT,
  DocStyles.display_name DEFAULT_DOCSTYLE,
  ApprActions.meaning DEFAULT_APPROVE_ACTION,
  YesOrNo.meaning BUYER_MANAGED_TRANSPORT,
  YesVal.meaning DEFAULT_YES,
  NoVal.meaning DEFAULT_NO,
TO_DATE(sysdate) CURRENT_SYSTEM_DATE,
DEFAULT_RATE_TYPE,
  (
    SELECT
      LOOKUP_CODE
    FROM
      FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL
    WHERE
      LOOKUP_TYPE = 'DOCUMENT_COMMUNICATION_METHOD'
      AND Enabled_flag = 'Y'
      AND TRUNC(sysdate) BETWEEN TRUNC(start_date_active)
      AND NVL(TRUNC(end_date_active), SYSDATE)
      AND LOOKUP_CODE = 'NONE'
  ) DEFAULT_NONE_METHOD,
  (
    SELECT
      MEANING
    FROM
      FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL
    WHERE
      LOOKUP_TYPE = 'DOCUMENT_COMMUNICATION_METHOD'
      AND Enabled_flag = 'Y'
      AND TRUNC(sysdate) BETWEEN TRUNC(start_date_active)
      AND NVL(TRUNC(end_date_active), SYSDATE)
      AND LOOKUP_CODE = 'NONE'
  ) DEFAULT_MEANING_NONE_METHOD,
  (
    SELECT
      meaning
    FROM
      FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL
    WHERE
      lookup_type LIKE 'RCV_ROUTING_HEADERS'
      AND sysdate BETWEEN NVL(start_date_active, sysdate -1)
      AND NVL(end_date_active, sysdate + 1)
      AND lookup_code = 3
  ) DEFAULT_RECEIPT_ROUTING,
  (
    SELECT
      meaning
    FROM
      FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL
    WHERE
      lookup_type LIKE 'PO INVOICE MATCH OPTION'
      AND sysdate BETWEEN NVL(start_date_active, sysdate -1)
      AND NVL(end_date_active, sysdate + 1)
      AND lookup_code = 'P'
  ) DEFAULT_INVO_MATCH_OPTION
FROM
  FUN_BU_USAGES_V BusinessUnitUsage,
  FUN_ALL_BUSINESS_UNITS_V BusinessUnit,
  FUN_BUSINESS_FUNCTIONS_B BusinessFunction,
  PER_PERSON_NAMES_F_V people,
  per_users users,
  PO_SYSTEM_PARAMETERS_ALL psp,
  PO_LINE_TYPES_VL PLT,
  AP_TERMS_VL TermsInfo,
  HZ_PARTIES ParCarriers,
  FND_LOOKUPS FreightTerms,
  FND_LOOKUPS Fob,
  PO_DOC_STYLE_LINES_VL DocStyles,
  FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL ApprActions,
  FND_LOOKUPS YesVal,
  FND_LOOKUPS YesOrNo,
  FND_LOOKUPS NoVal
WHERE
  (
    BusinessUnitUsage.BUSINESS_UNIT_ID = BusinessUnit.BU_ID
    AND BusinessUnitUsage.MODULE_ID = BusinessFunction.BUSINESS_FUNCTION_ID
  )
  AND (
    (
      (
        BusinessFunction.BUSINESS_FUNCTION_CODE = 'PROCUREMENT_BF'
      )
    )
  )
  AND people.person_id = users.person_id
  AND users.user_guid = fnd_global.user_guid
  AND nvl(null, trunc(sysdate)) between nvl(
    people.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
    nvl(null, trunc(sysdate))
  )
  and nvl(
    people.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,
    nvl(null, trunc(sysdate))
  )
  AND psp.prc_bu_id = BusinessUnit.BU_ID
  AND plt.line_type_id(+) = psp.line_type_id
  AND TermsInfo.term_id(+) = psp.terms_id
  AND ParCarriers.party_id(+) = psp.carrier_id
  AND FreightTerms.LOOKUP_CODE(+) = psp.FREIGHT_TERMS_LOOKUP_CODE
  AND FreightTerms.LOOKUP_TYPE(+) = 'FREIGHT TERMS'
  AND (
    Fob.lookup_type (+) = 'FOB'
    and Fob.lookup_code (+) = psp.fob_lookup_code
  )
  AND (
    DocStyles.style_id (+) = psp.style_id
    and DocStyles.document_subtype (+) = 'STANDARD'
  )
  AND (
    ApprActions.lookup_code (+) = decode(
      nvl(psp.bypass_approval_flag, 'N'),
      'N',
      'SUBMIT',
      'Y',
      'BYPASS'
    )
    and ApprActions.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'APPROVAL_ACTION'
  )
  AND (
    YesOrNo.lookup_code (+) = nvl(psp.buyer_managed_transport_flag, 'N')
    and YesOrNo.lookup_type = 'YES_NO'
  )
  AND (
    YesVal.lookup_code = 'Y'
    and YesVal.lookup_type = 'YES_NO'
  )
  AND (
    NoVal.lookup_code = 'N'
    and NoVal.lookup_type = 'YES_NO'
  )
  AND bu_id in (
    select
      prc_bu_id
    from
      PO_AGENT_ASSIGNMENTS paa,
      PER_USERS pu
    where
      paa.agent_id = pu.person_id
      and paa.active_flag = 'Y'
      and pu.user_guid = fnd_global.user_guid
  )
  AND (
    BusinessUnit.BU_NAME LIKE (:PROCUREMENT_BU_SEARCH)
    OR BusinessUnit.BU_NAME IN (:PROCUREMENT_BU)
  )
  AND ROWNUM <= 10000

Rows.Notes: Name of the business unit that raised the requisition for goods and services.
Rows.Designer_Description: Name of the business unit that raised the requisition for goods and services
Rows.Report_SQL: SELECT   distinct BUs.bu_id BUSINESS_UNIT_ID,   BUs.BU_NAME REQUISITIONING_NAME,   COALESCE(     location.inventory_organization_id,     BuOptions.inv_org_id   ) INVENTORY_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM   FUN_ALL_BUSINESS_UNITS_V BUs,   POR_USER_PREFERENCES_ALL Prefs,   PER_USERS Usr,   HR_LOCATIONS_ALL_VL location,   POR_REQ_BU_OPTIONS_ALL BuOptions WHERE   Prefs.req_bu_id = BUs.bu_id   AND Usr.user_guid = fnd_global.user_guid   AND Usr.person_id = Prefs.person_id   AND Prefs.deliver_to_location_id = location.location_id   AND (     BUs.BU_NAME LIKE (:BU_NAME_SEARCH)     OR BUs.BU_NAME IN (:BU_NAME)   )   AND sysdate BETWEEN location.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE   AND location.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE   AND Prefs.req_bu_id = BuOptions.req_bu_id   AND ROWNUM <= 10000

Rows.Notes: Value "New Order" ( and in phase 2 "Existing Order")
Rows.Designer_Description: Values that uniquely identify the document type. Type can be a new order or an existing order or a negotiation
Contains one of the following values: Y or N. If Y, then requisition lines are combined on order lines in the purchase order. If N, then you can't group requisition lines.
Number that uniquely identifies the source agreement
Rows.Report_SQL: select   po_headers.segment1,   po_headers.po_header_id,   po_headers.type_lookup_code,   suppliers.segment1 supplier_number,   suppliers.vendor_name,   sites.vendor_site_code,   po_headers.type_lookup_code||' - '||suppliers.vendor_name||'('||suppliers.segment1||') - '||sites.vendor_site_code agreement_info from   po_headers po_headers,   POZ_SUPPLIERS_V suppliers,   POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_V sites where   po_headers.vendor_id = suppliers.vendor_id   AND suppliers.vendor_id = sites.vendor_id   AND sites.vendor_site_id = po_headers.vendor_site_id   AND type_lookup_code in ('BLANKET', 'CONTRACT')   AND (     EXISTS (       SELECT         0       FROM         po_agent_accesses poagentaccess       WHERE         poagentaccess.agent_id IN (           SELECT             hrc_session_util.get_user_personid           FROM             dual         )         AND poagentaccess.prc_bu_id = po_headers.prc_bu_id         AND (           (             po_headers.type_lookup_code = 'STANDARD'             AND poagentaccess.access_action_code = 'MANAGE_PURCHASE_ORDERS'           )           OR (             po_headers.type_lookup_code IN ('BLANKET', 'CONTRACT')             AND poagentaccess.access_action_code = 'MANAGE_PURCHASE_AGREEMENTS'           )         )         AND poagentaccess.active_flag = 'Y'         AND poagentaccess.allowed_flag = 'Y'         AND (           poagentaccess.access_others_level_code IN ('VIEW', 'MODIFY', 'FULL')           OR po_headers.agent_id = poagentaccess.agent_id         )     )   )   AND (     po_headers.segment1 LIKE (:AGREEMENT_NUMBER_SEARCH)     OR po_headers.segment1 IN (:AGREEMENT_NUMBER)   ) order by   po_headers.segment1

Rows.Designer_Description: Value that indicates the source agreement information
Name of the supplier. Organization or individual that provides goods or services to the buying organization for payment, bound by a contractual obligation
Rows.Report_SQL: SELECT distinct   PartyPEO.PARTY_NAME,   SupplierPEO.PARTY_ID,   SupplierPEO.VENDOR_ID,   SupplierPEO.SEGMENT1 SUPPLIER_NUMBER,   DECODE(     count (*) over(partition by SupplierPEO.vendor_id),     1,     Sites.vendor_site_code,     null   ) DEFAULT_SITE,   SiteAssigns.BU_ID REQ_BU_ID FROM   POZ_SUPPLIERS SupplierPEO,   HZ_PARTIES PartyPEO,   HZ_ADDTNL_PARTY_NAMES AdditionalPartyNamePEO,   POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL_M Sites,   POZ_SITE_ASSIGNMENTS_ALL_M SiteAssigns WHERE   SupplierPEO.PARTY_ID = PartyPEO.PARTY_ID   AND PartyPEO.party_type = 'ORGANIZATION'   AND PartyPEO.PARTY_ID = AdditionalPartyNamePEO.PARTY_ID(+)   AND AdditionalPartyNamePEO.PARTY_NAME_TYPE(+) = 'PHONETIC'   AND AdditionalPartyNamePEO.PREFERRED_FLAG(+) = 'Y'   AND SupplierPEO.BUSINESS_RELATIONSHIP = 'SPEND_AUTHORIZED'   AND NVL(SupplierPEO.START_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE -1) < SYSDATE   AND NVL(SupplierPEO.END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE   AND AdditionalPartyNamePEO.STATUS_FLAG(+) = 'A'   AND (     EXISTS(       SELECT         1       FROM         POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL_M SupplierSiteDPEONQ1,         HZ_PARTY_SITES PartySitePEONQ1       WHERE         SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.PARTY_SITE_ID = PartySitePEONQ1.PARTY_SITE_ID         AND NVL(PartySitePEONQ1.END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE         AND NVL(PartySitePEONQ1.START_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE -1) < SYSDATE         AND NVL(SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.INACTIVE_DATE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE         AND (SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.RFQ_ONLY_SITE_FLAG = 'Y')         AND (           SupplierPEO.VENDOR_ID = SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.VENDOR_ID         )     )     OR EXISTS(       SELECT         1       FROM         POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL_M SupplierSiteDPEONQ1,         POZ_SITE_ASSIGNMENTS_ALL_M SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1,         HZ_PARTY_SITES PartySitePEONQ1       WHERE         SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.VENDOR_SITE_ID = SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1.VENDOR_SITE_ID         AND PartySitePEONQ1.PARTY_SITE_ID = SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.PARTY_SITE_ID         AND NVL(           SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1.INACTIVE_DATE,           SYSDATE + 1         ) > SYSDATE         AND NVL(PartySitePEONQ1.END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE         AND NVL(PartySitePEONQ1.START_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE - 1) < SYSDATE         AND NVL(SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.INACTIVE_DATE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE         AND (SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.PURCHASING_SITE_FLAG = 'Y')         AND (           SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1.BU_ID IN (:REQ_BU_ID)         )         AND (           SupplierPEO.VENDOR_ID = SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.VENDOR_ID         )     )   )   AND (     PartyPEO.PARTY_NAME IN (:SUPPLIER)     OR PartyPEO.PARTY_NAME LIKE (:SUPPLIER_SEARCH)   )    AND Sites.vendor_id = SupplierPEO.vendor_id    AND Sites.vendor_site_id = SiteAssigns.vendor_site_id    AND SiteAssigns.bu_id IN (:REQ_BU_ID)   AND ROWNUM < 10000 ORDER BY   PartyPEO.PARTY_NAME

Rows.Designer_Description: Number uniquly identifies the Supplier
Rows.Report_SQL: SELECT   distinct    SupplierPEO.SEGMENT1 SUPPLIER_NUMBER,   PartyPEO.PARTY_NAME,   SupplierPEO.PARTY_ID,   SupplierPEO.VENDOR_ID,   DECODE(     count (*) over(partition by SupplierPEO.vendor_id),     1,     Sites.vendor_site_code,     null   ) DEFAULT_SITE,   SiteAssigns.BU_ID REQ_BU_ID FROM   POZ_SUPPLIERS SupplierPEO,   HZ_PARTIES PartyPEO,   HZ_ADDTNL_PARTY_NAMES AdditionalPartyNamePEO,   POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL_M Sites,   POZ_SITE_ASSIGNMENTS_ALL_M SiteAssigns WHERE   SupplierPEO.PARTY_ID = PartyPEO.PARTY_ID   AND PartyPEO.party_type = 'ORGANIZATION'   AND PartyPEO.PARTY_ID = AdditionalPartyNamePEO.PARTY_ID(+)   AND AdditionalPartyNamePEO.PARTY_NAME_TYPE(+) = 'PHONETIC'   AND AdditionalPartyNamePEO.PREFERRED_FLAG(+) = 'Y'   AND SupplierPEO.BUSINESS_RELATIONSHIP = 'SPEND_AUTHORIZED'   AND NVL(SupplierPEO.START_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE -1) < SYSDATE   AND NVL(SupplierPEO.END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE   AND AdditionalPartyNamePEO.STATUS_FLAG(+) = 'A'   AND (     EXISTS(       SELECT         1       FROM         POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL_M SupplierSiteDPEONQ1,         HZ_PARTY_SITES PartySitePEONQ1       WHERE         SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.PARTY_SITE_ID = PartySitePEONQ1.PARTY_SITE_ID         AND NVL(PartySitePEONQ1.END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE         AND NVL(PartySitePEONQ1.START_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE -1) < SYSDATE         AND NVL(SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.INACTIVE_DATE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE         AND (SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.RFQ_ONLY_SITE_FLAG = 'Y')         AND (           SupplierPEO.VENDOR_ID = SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.VENDOR_ID         )     )     OR EXISTS(       SELECT         1       FROM         POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL_M SupplierSiteDPEONQ1,         POZ_SITE_ASSIGNMENTS_ALL_M SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1,         HZ_PARTY_SITES PartySitePEONQ1       WHERE         SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.VENDOR_SITE_ID = SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1.VENDOR_SITE_ID         AND PartySitePEONQ1.PARTY_SITE_ID = SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.PARTY_SITE_ID         AND NVL(           SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1.INACTIVE_DATE,           SYSDATE + 1         ) > SYSDATE         AND NVL(PartySitePEONQ1.END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE         AND NVL(PartySitePEONQ1.START_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE - 1) < SYSDATE         AND NVL(SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.INACTIVE_DATE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE         AND (SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.PURCHASING_SITE_FLAG = 'Y')         AND (           SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1.BU_ID IN (:REQ_BU_ID)         )         AND (           SupplierPEO.VENDOR_ID = SupplierSiteDPEONQ1.VENDOR_ID         )     )   )   AND (     SupplierPEO.SEGMENT1 LIKE (:SUPPLIER_NUMBER_SEARCH)     OR     SupplierPEO.SEGMENT1 IN (:SUPPLIER_NUMBER)   )   AND Sites.vendor_id = SupplierPEO.vendor_id   AND Sites.vendor_site_id = SiteAssigns.vendor_site_id   AND SiteAssigns.bu_id IN (:REQ_BU_ID)   AND ROWNUM < 10000 ORDER BY   SupplierPEO.SEGMENT1

Rows.Designer_Description: Location that the supplier uses to purchase the item
Rows.Report_SQL: SELECT   distinct   SupplierPEO.VENDOR_ID SUPPLIER_ID,   SupplierSiteDPEO.VENDOR_SITE_ID,   SupplierSiteDPEO.VENDOR_SITE_CODE,   --BusinessUnitPEO.BU_ID REQ_BU_ID,   decode(COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY SupplierSiteDPEO.VENDOR_SITE_CODE), 1, decode(sign(Contacts.inactive_date-sysdate), 1, contacts.full_name, null), NULL) DEFAULT_CONTACT,   Requisitioning.BU_ID REQ_BU_ID FROM   POZ_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL_M SupplierSiteDPEO,   HZ_PARTY_SITES PartySitePEO,   POZ_SUPPLIERS SupplierPEO,   HZ_PARTIES PartyPEO,   HZ_LOCATIONS LocationPEO,   FUN_ALL_BUSINESS_UNITS_V BusinessUnitPEO,   POZ_SUPPLIER_CONTACTS_V Contacts,   (     select BU_ID from FUN_ALL_BUSINESS_UNITS_V where bu_id IN (:REQ_BU_ID)   ) Requisitioning WHERE   PARTYPEO.PARTY_ID = SUPPLIERPEO.PARTY_ID   AND SUPPLIERPEO.VENDOR_ID = SUPPLIERSITEDPEO.VENDOR_ID   AND SUPPLIERSITEDPEO.PARTY_SITE_ID = PARTYSITEPEO.PARTY_SITE_ID   AND NVL(PARTYSITEPEO.END_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE   AND NVL(PARTYSITEPEO.START_DATE_ACTIVE, SYSDATE -1) < SYSDATE   AND NVL(SUPPLIERSITEDPEO.INACTIVE_DATE, SYSDATE + 1) > SYSDATE   AND LOCATIONPEO.LOCATION_ID(+) = PARTYSITEPEO.LOCATION_ID   AND BusinessUnitPEO.BU_ID (+) = SUPPLIERSITEDPEO.PRC_BU_ID   AND (     (         (SupplierSiteDPEO.RFQ_ONLY_SITE_FLAG = 'Y')         OR           EXISTS(             SELECT               1             FROM               POZ_SITE_ASSIGNMENTS_ALL_M SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1             WHERE               NVL(                 SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1.INACTIVE_DATE,                 SYSDATE + 1               ) > SYSDATE               AND (SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1.BU_ID IN (:REQ_BU_ID))               AND (SupplierSiteDPEO.VENDOR_SITE_ID = SupplierSiteAssignmentDPEONQ1.VENDOR_SITE_ID)           )     )     AND (         (SupplierSiteDPEO.PURCHASING_SITE_FLAG = 'Y')         OR         (SupplierSiteDPEO.RFQ_ONLY_SITE_FLAG = 'Y')         )     AND (SupplierPEO.VENDOR_ID IN (:SUPPLIER_ID))     AND ( SupplierSiteDPEO.VENDOR_SITE_CODE IN (:SUPPLIER_SITE) OR SupplierSiteDPEO.VENDOR_SITE_CODE LIKE(:SUPPLIER_SITE_SEARCH) )   )   AND SupplierSiteDPEO.vendor_site_id = Contacts.vendor_site_id(+)   AND (Contacts.INACTIVE_DATE > sysdate OR Contacts.INACTIVE_DATE is null)   AND ROWNUM < 10000 ORDER BY   SUPPLIERSITEDPEO.VENDOR_SITE_CODE

Rows.Default_Comments: The result of submitting processing requisitions
Rows.Designer_Description: The result of submitting processing requisitions

Rows.Default_Comments: Value of Yes will submit processing requisitions
Rows.Designer_Description: Value of Yes will submit processing requisitions

Rows.Default_Comments: Value of Yes will delete processing requisitions
Rows.Designer_Description: Value of Yes will delete processing requisitions
Contains a true, or false. If true, then requisition is externally managed. If false, then requisition isn't externally managed
Reason for creating the requisition
Legal entity that is financially responsible for purchases on the purchase order
Selecting this value will generate the configured descriptive flexfield attributes in the instance for this section.

Rows.Default_Comments: Valid values are Create and Create records
Rows.Report_Where_Criteria: LookupType in ('ORA_WIS_WD_IMP_HEADER_ACTION', 'IMPORT_MODE') AND LookupCode in ('CREATE','CREATE_ONLY') AND ViewApplicationId=0

Rows.Designer_Description: Value that uniquely identifies the requisition
Number that uniquely identifies the requisition
Rows.Report_SQL: WITH LATEST_PERSON_NAME AS (     SELECT PERSON_ID, DISPLAY_NAME, EFFECTIVE_END_DATE     FROM (         SELECT PERSON_ID, DISPLAY_NAME, EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,                ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PERSON_ID ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_END_DATE DESC) AS RN         FROM PER_PERSON_NAMES_F_V     ) WHERE RN = 1 ) SELECT   header.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID,   header.REQUISITION_NUMBER,   header.REQ_BU_ID,   Bunits.BU_NAME,   header.DOCUMENT_STATUS,   PerName.display_name PREPARER_NAME FROM  POR_REQUISITION_HEADERS_ALL header JOIN  LATEST_PERSON_NAME PerName ON PerName.person_id = header.preparer_id JOIN  FUN_NAMES_BUSINESS_UNITS_V Bunits ON Bunits.bu_id = header.req_bu_id WHERE   ROWNUM <= 10000   AND (     header.REQUISITION_NUMBER LIKE (:REQ_NUMBER_SEARCH)     OR     header.REQUISITION_NUMBER IN (:REQ_NUMBER)   )   AND header.REQ_BU_ID in (     select       BusinessUnitUsage.BUSINESS_UNIT_ID     from       FUN_BU_USAGES_V BusinessUnitUsage,       FUN_BUSINESS_FUNCTIONS_B BusinessFunction     where       BusinessUnitUsage.MODULE_ID = BusinessFunction.BUSINESS_FUNCTION_ID       and BusinessFunction.BUSINESS_FUNCTION_CODE = 'REQUISITIONING_BF'       and BusinessUnitUsage.BUSINESS_UNIT_ID IN (:REQ_BU_ID)   ) ORDER BY   REQUISITION_NUMBER

Rows.Designer_Description: Number that uniquely identifies the requisition line
Rows.Report_SQL: SELECT   REQUISITION_LINE_ID,   REQUISITION_HEADER_ID REQ_HEADER_ID,   LINE_NUMBER,   REQ_BU_ID FROM   por_requisition_lines_all lines WHERE lines.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID in (:REQ_HEADER_ID) AND lines.REQ_BU_ID IN (:REQ_BU_ID) AND (lines.LINE_NUMBER IN (:LINE_NUMBER) OR lines.LINE_NUMBER LIKE (:LINE_NUMBER_SEARCH)) AND ROWNUM <= 10000

Rows.Designer_Description: Value that uniquely identifies the request line
Value that uniquely identifies the requisition line
Name of the business unit that raised the requisition for goods and services
Business unit that manages and owns the requisition and corresponding purchase order or a negotiation
Number that uniquely identifies the source agreement referenced by the purchase requisition line
Value that indicates whether the referenced agreement is a blanket purchase agreement or a contract purchase agreement
Number that identifies the line of the source agreement referenced by the purchase requisition line
Name of the supplier
Number that uniquely identifies the Supplier
Location that the supplier uses to purchase the item
Name of the user who owns the requisition. This user creates the requisition but can transfer ownership to another user
Person who is responsible for managing the procurement document
Status of the requisition
Description of the item that the purchase order references
Value that indicates the source application from which the purchase order was imported
Abbreviation that identifies the purchase requisition line status in the line life cycle
Values that uniquely identify the document type
Abbreviation that uniquely identifies the item
Number that identifies the revision of the item
Description of the item
Abbreviation that identifies the purchasing category
Number that the supplier uses to identify the item on the requisition line
Unit of measure of the item quantity
Quantity of the goods being purchased
Total amount of the requested items in the currency of the buying company
Total amount of the requested item in the currency of the supplier
Purchase requisition currency
Price of the requested item in the currency of the supplier
Date when the buying company requested the ordered item or service to be delivered
Value that uniquely identifies the hazard class
Value that identifies the negotiation document associated with the requisition line
Type of destination to determine how the purchased goods or services should be charged. Valid values include Inventory, Expense, Drop Ship, and Work Order
Abbreviation that identifies the inventory organization where the supplier should deliver the goods
The inventory organization where the supplier should deliver the goods
Name of the location to which the buying company should deliver goods received from a supplier
Name of the location code to which the buying company should deliver goods received from a supplier
Person for whom goods or services are being ordered
Number that uniquely identifies the person for whom goods or services are being ordered
Date when the requested items were canceled
Reason for canceling the requested items
Value that indicates the source of the line. This attribute isn't currently used
Price of the requested item in the currency of the buying company
Scheduled quantity in terms of the secondary unit of measure for a dual unit of measure controlled item
Secondary unit of measure to use for the quantity of a dual unit of measure controlled item
Type of rate used to determine the currency conversion rate for the purchase requisition
Date from when the conversion rate is used to convert an amount into another currency
Conversion rate to use when converting the currency
Contains a true or false. If true, then the requisition line requires urgent processing. If false, then the line doesn't require urgent processing
United Nations identification number for the hazardous material
Abbreviation that identifies the hazard class specified on the line
Abbreviation that identifies the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) for taxonomy of products and services
Name of the subinventory that identifies where to deliver the requested item
Contains a true or false. If true, then the location on final delivery of goods is a one-time delivery address. If false, then the location of delivery is an existing address
Physical address of the one-time location where the buying company should deliver the goods that were previously received from a supplier
Formatted physical address of the final location where the buying company should deliver the goods previously received from a supplier
Note to the buyer on the purchase requisition
Note to the receiver on the purchase requisition
Note to the supplier on the purchase requisition
Functional reason for the failure of automatic processing of requisition line to purchase order
Value that uniquely identifies the purchase order header
Value that uniquely identifies the parent purchase order line
Display number that uniquely identifies a work order in a plant
Sequence to use when performing the work order operations
Value that identifies the finished goods of the contract manufacturing work order
Display name used to identify the subtype of the manufacturing work order
Contains a true or false. If true, then the PR line is intended to fulfill a specific customer sales order upon receipt. If false, then the PR line doesn't have a backing sales order
Contains a true or false. If true, then the PR line is for a configured item and configuration details might exist. If false, then the requisition line isn't for a configured item.
Name of the third party to whom the materials need to be delivered
Value that uniquely identifies the third-party location to which materials need to be delivered
Date when the buying company requested the ordered item to be shipped
Number that uniquely identifies the sales order line for a given customer sales order
Number that uniquely identifies a backing customer sales order number
Number that uniquely identifies the sales order schedule for a given customer sales order line
Name of the party who will receive the materials that are shipped
Transportation priority that determines how quickly to transport goods
Abbreviation that identifies the mode of transport
Company that transports goods from one point to another by land, sea, or air
Date when the requisition line was last submitted for approval
Date when the requisition lines was last approved
Date when the requisition line was first submitted for approval
Date when the requisition line was first approved
Contains a true or false. If true, then the supplier entered on the line is a new supplier. If false, then the supplier entered on the line is an existing supplier
Name of the person representing the supplier with regards to communication with the buying company
Number that identifies the purchase order
Name of the person representing the new supplier involved in supporting the customer relationship
Phone number of the person representing the new supplier
Fax number of the person representing the new supplier
Name of the company that manufactures the item being purchased
Number that uniquely identifies the item as provided by the manufacturer
Contains a true or false. If true, then the BPA price attribute has been updated by the user. If false, then the BPA price attribute hasn't been updated by the user
Email address of the supplier contact
Phone number of the supplier contact
Fax number if the supplier contact
Name of the buyer suggested for managing the purchase requisition line through its life cycle
Email address of the suggested buyer
Buyer who modified the requisition line by splitting the requisition line or by replacing the requested item with a catalog item
Name of the person responsible for managing the purchase requisition through its life cycle
Email address of the person responsible for managing the purchase requisition through its life cycle
Name of the person responsible for managing the purchase requisition through its life cycle
Name of the inventory organization that will supply the item to the destination inventory organization in an internal material transfer operation
Subinventory within a source inventory organization that will supply the item to the destination inventory organization in an internal material transfer operation
Number that identifies the transfer order document associated with the requisition line
Value that uniquely identifies the transfer order line associated with the requisition line
Value that uniquely identifies the negotiation document associated with the requisition line
Value that identifies the negotiation document associated with the requisition line
Number that identifies the negotiation line associated with the requisition line
Number that identifies the response submitted by supplier for a negotiation document
Number that identifies the line in a response submitted by supplier for a negotiation
Contains a true or false. If true, then the requisition line is part of an active sourcing negotiation. If false, then the requisition line isn't part of an active negotiation
Selecting this value will generate the configured descriptive flexfield attributes in the instance for this section.

Rows.Report_Where_Criteria: LookupType in ('ORA_WIS_WD_IMP_HEADER_ACTION', 'IMPORT_MODE') AND LookupCode NOT in ('CREATE_RECORD','DELETE_RECORD','DELETE') AND ViewApplicationId=0

Rows.Designer_Description: Number that uniquely identifies the distribution associated with a purchase requisition line
Value that uniquely identifies the purchasing requisition distribution
Quantity of goods being purchased
Monetary amount associated with the distribution line in the currency of the supplier
Account that the purchase from a requisition is charged to
Date from which the budget is consumed. This date is used to determine the budget period
Tax that the requisition amount doesn't include. The tax amount is added to the line amount. The purchaser cannot recover this tax
Tax that the requisition amount doesn't include. The tax amount is added to the line amount. The purchaser can recover this tax
Number of the project that is being created
Name of the Project that has a specific start and finish dates, and is undertaken to create a product or provide a service
Number assigned to a task. A task is a subdivision of project work
Name assigned to a task.. A task is a subdivision of project work
The classification of cost assigned to each expenditure item
The organization that is incurring the expense on the transaction
The date when work is performed and is charged to a project and task

Rows.Report_SQL: SELECT   distinct BUs.bu_id BUSINESS_UNIT_ID,   BUs.BU_NAME REQUISITIONING_NAME,   COALESCE(     location.inventory_organization_id,     BuOptions.inv_org_id   ) INVENTORY_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM   FUN_ALL_BUSINESS_UNITS_V BUs,   POR_USER_PREFERENCES_ALL Prefs,   PER_USERS Usr,   HR_LOCATIONS_ALL_VL location,   POR_REQ_BU_OPTIONS_ALL BuOptions WHERE   Prefs.req_bu_id = BUs.bu_id   AND Usr.user_guid = fnd_global.user_guid   AND Usr.person_id = Prefs.person_id   AND Prefs.deliver_to_location_id = location.location_id   AND (     BUs.BU_NAME LIKE (:BU_NAME_SEARCH)     OR BUs.BU_NAME IN (:BU_NAME)   )   AND sysdate BETWEEN location.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE   AND location.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE   AND Prefs.req_bu_id = BuOptions.req_bu_id   AND ROWNUM <= 10000

WITH LATEST_PERSON_NAME AS (     SELECT PERSON_ID, DISPLAY_NAME, EFFECTIVE_END_DATE     FROM (         SELECT PERSON_ID, DISPLAY_NAME, EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,                ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PERSON_ID ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_END_DATE DESC) AS RN         FROM PER_PERSON_NAMES_F_V     ) WHERE RN = 1 ) SELECT   header.REQUISITION_HEADER_ID,   header.REQUISITION_NUMBER,   header.REQ_BU_ID,   Bunits.BU_NAME,   header.DOCUMENT_STATUS,   PerName.display_name PREPARER_NAME FROM  POR_REQUISITION_HEADERS_ALL header JOIN  LATEST_PERSON_NAME PerName ON PerName.person_id = header.preparer_id JOIN  FUN_NAMES_BUSINESS_UNITS_V Bunits ON Bunits.bu_id = header.req_bu_id WHERE   ROWNUM <= 10000   AND (     header.REQUISITION_NUMBER LIKE (:REQ_NUMBER_SEARCH)     OR     header.REQUISITION_NUMBER IN (:REQ_NUMBER)   )   AND header.REQ_BU_ID in (     select       BusinessUnitUsage.BUSINESS_UNIT_ID     from       FUN_BU_USAGES_V BusinessUnitUsage,       FUN_BUSINESS_FUNCTIONS_B BusinessFunction     where       BusinessUnitUsage.MODULE_ID = BusinessFunction.BUSINESS_FUNCTION_ID       and BusinessFunction.BUSINESS_FUNCTION_CODE = 'REQUISITIONING_BF'       and BusinessUnitUsage.BUSINESS_UNIT_ID IN (:REQ_BU_ID)   ) ORDER BY   REQUISITION_NUMBER

WITH LATEST_PERSON_NAME AS (     SELECT PERSON_ID, DISPLAY_NAME, EFFECTIVE_END_DATE     FROM (         SELECT PERSON_ID, DISPLAY_NAME, EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,                ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PERSON_ID ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_END_DATE DESC) AS RN         FROM PER_PERSON_NAMES_F_V     ) WHERE RN = 1 ) SELECT   pu.person_id PREPARER_ID,   PerName.display_name PREPARER_NAME FROM   LATEST_PERSON_NAME PerName,   PER_USERS pu WHERE   PerName.person_id = pu.person_id   AND pu.active_flag = 'Y'   AND pu.suspended = 'N'   AND sysdate between pu.start_date and nvl2(pu.end_date, pu.end_date, sysdate)   AND ( PerName.display_name LIKE (:PREP_NAME_SEARCH)             OR PerName.display_name IN (:PREP_NAME))   AND ROWNUM <= 10000 ORDER BY PerName.display_name

Rows.Notes: Not supported by the REST service

Rows.Report_SQL: SELECT   BusinessUnitUsage.MODULE_ID,   BusinessUnit.BU_ID,   BusinessUnit.BU_NAME AS PROCUREMENT_BU,   BusinessUnit.DEFAULT_CURRENCY_CODE,   people.list_name DEFAULT_BUYER,   PLT.line_type_id DEFAULT_LINE_TYPE_ID,   PLT.line_type DEFAULT_LINE_TYPE,   TermsInfo.name PAYMENT_TERMS,   ParCarriers.party_name SHIPPING_METHOD,   FreightTerms.meaning FREIGHT_TERM,   Fob.meaning FOB_OPT,   DocStyles.display_name DEFAULT_DOCSTYLE,   ApprActions.meaning DEFAULT_APPROVE_ACTION,   YesOrNo.meaning BUYER_MANAGED_TRANSPORT,   YesVal.meaning DEFAULT_YES,   NoVal.meaning DEFAULT_NO,   (     SELECT       LOOKUP_CODE     FROM       FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL     WHERE       LOOKUP_TYPE = 'DOCUMENT_COMMUNICATION_METHOD'       AND Enabled_flag = 'Y'       AND TRUNC(sysdate) BETWEEN TRUNC(start_date_active)       AND NVL(TRUNC(end_date_active), SYSDATE)       AND LOOKUP_CODE = 'NONE'   ) DEFAULT_NONE_METHOD,   (     SELECT       MEANING     FROM       FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL     WHERE       LOOKUP_TYPE = 'DOCUMENT_COMMUNICATION_METHOD'       AND Enabled_flag = 'Y'       AND TRUNC(sysdate) BETWEEN TRUNC(start_date_active)       AND NVL(TRUNC(end_date_active), SYSDATE)       AND LOOKUP_CODE = 'NONE'   ) DEFAULT_MEANING_NONE_METHOD,   (     SELECT       meaning     FROM       FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL     WHERE       lookup_type LIKE 'RCV_ROUTING_HEADERS'       AND sysdate BETWEEN NVL(start_date_active, sysdate -1)       AND NVL(end_date_active, sysdate + 1)       AND lookup_code = 3   ) DEFAULT_RECEIPT_ROUTING,   (     SELECT       meaning     FROM       FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL     WHERE       lookup_type LIKE 'PO INVOICE MATCH OPTION'       AND sysdate BETWEEN NVL(start_date_active, sysdate -1)       AND NVL(end_date_active, sysdate + 1)       AND lookup_code = 'P'   ) DEFAULT_INVO_MATCH_OPTION FROM   FUN_BU_USAGES_V BusinessUnitUsage,   FUN_ALL_BUSINESS_UNITS_V BusinessUnit,   FUN_BUSINESS_FUNCTIONS_B BusinessFunction,   PER_PERSON_NAMES_F_V people,   per_users users,   PO_SYSTEM_PARAMETERS_ALL psp,   PO_LINE_TYPES_VL PLT,   AP_TERMS_VL TermsInfo,   HZ_PARTIES ParCarriers,   FND_LOOKUPS FreightTerms,   FND_LOOKUPS Fob,   PO_DOC_STYLE_LINES_VL DocStyles,   FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL ApprActions,   FND_LOOKUPS YesVal,   FND_LOOKUPS YesOrNo,   FND_LOOKUPS NoVal WHERE   (     BusinessUnitUsage.BUSINESS_UNIT_ID = BusinessUnit.BU_ID     AND BusinessUnitUsage.MODULE_ID = BusinessFunction.BUSINESS_FUNCTION_ID   )   AND (     (       (         BusinessFunction.BUSINESS_FUNCTION_CODE = 'PROCUREMENT_BF'       )     )   )   AND people.person_id = users.person_id   AND users.user_guid = fnd_global.user_guid   AND nvl(null, trunc(sysdate)) between nvl(     people.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,     nvl(null, trunc(sysdate))   )   and nvl(     people.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,     nvl(null, trunc(sysdate))   )   AND psp.prc_bu_id = BusinessUnit.BU_ID   AND plt.line_type_id(+) = psp.line_type_id   AND TermsInfo.term_id(+) = psp.terms_id   AND ParCarriers.party_id(+) = psp.carrier_id   AND FreightTerms.LOOKUP_CODE(+) = psp.FREIGHT_TERMS_LOOKUP_CODE   AND FreightTerms.LOOKUP_TYPE(+) = 'FREIGHT TERMS'   AND (     Fob.lookup_type (+) = 'FOB'     and Fob.lookup_code (+) = psp.fob_lookup_code   )   AND (     DocStyles.style_id (+) = psp.style_id     and DocStyles.document_subtype = 'STANDARD'   )   AND (     ApprActions.lookup_code (+) = decode(       nvl(psp.bypass_approval_flag, 'N'),       'N',       'SUBMIT',       'Y',       'BYPASS'     )     and ApprActions.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'APPROVAL_ACTION'   )   AND (     YesOrNo.lookup_code (+) = nvl(psp.buyer_managed_transport_flag, 'N')     and YesOrNo.lookup_type = 'YES_NO'   )   AND (     YesVal.lookup_code = 'Y'     and YesVal.lookup_type = 'YES_NO'   )   AND (     NoVal.lookup_code = 'N'     and NoVal.lookup_type = 'YES_NO'   )   AND bu_id in (     select       prc_bu_id     from       PO_AGENT_ASSIGNMENTS paa,       PER_USERS pu     where       paa.agent_id = pu.person_id       and paa.active_flag = 'Y'       and pu.user_guid = fnd_global.user_guid   )   AND (     BusinessUnit.BU_NAME LIKE (:PROCUREMENT_BU_SEARCH)     OR BusinessUnit.BU_NAME IN (:PROCUREMENT_BU)   )   AND ROWNUM <= 10000

SELECT distinct PersonNameDPEO.LIST_NAME Buyer, BuyerPEO.AGENT_ID , EmailAddressPEO.EMAIL_ADDRESS, BU.BU_NAME DEFAULT_REQ_BU, BuyerPEO.prc_bu_id PROCUREMENT_BU_ID FROM PO_AGENT_ACCESSES BuyerPEO, PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F PersonDPEO, PER_PERSON_NAMES_F_V PersonNameDPEO, PER_EMAIL_ADDRESSES EmailAddressPEO, PER_PERIODS_OF_SERVICE PeriodOfServicePEO, PER_ALL_ASSIGNMENTS_M AssignmentDPEO, HR_ORGANIZATION_UNITS_F_TL PrcBuPEO, PER_DEPARTMENTS DepartmentDPEO ,FUN_ALL_BUSINESS_UNITS_V BU WHERE PrcBuPEO.ORGANIZATION_ID = BuyerPEO.PRC_BU_ID AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN PrcBuPEO.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND PrcBuPEO.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE AND PrcBuPEO.LANGUAGE = USERENV('LANG') AND BU.BU_ID(+) = DEFAULT_REQ_BU_ID AND BuyerPEO.AGENT_ID = PeriodOfservicePEO.PERSON_ID AND PeriodOfservicePEO.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' AND AssignmentDPEO.PERSON_ID = BuyerPEO.AGENT_ID AND AssignmentDPEO.period_of_service_id = PeriodOfservicePEO.period_of_service_id AND AssignmentDPEO.primary_flag = 'Y' AND AssignmentDPEO.EFFECTIVE_LATEST_CHANGE = 'Y' AND sysdate BETWEEN assignmentdpeo.effective_start_date AND assignmentdpeo.effective_end_date AND BuyerPEO.AGENT_ID = PersonDPEO.PERSON_ID AND sysdate BETWEEN PersonDPEO.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND PersonDPEO.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE AND (EmailAddressPEO.EMAIL_ADDRESS_ID (+) = PersonDPEO.PRIMARY_EMAIL_ID) AND (BuyerPEO.AGENT_ID = PersonNameDPEO.PERSON_ID AND sysdate BETWEEN PersonNameDPEO.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND PersonNameDPEO.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE) AND (DepartmentDPEO.ORGANIZATION_ID (+) = AssignmentDPEO.ORGANIZATION_ID AND sysdate BETWEEN DepartmentDPEO.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE(+) AND DepartmentDPEO.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE(+)) AND (PersonNameDPEO.LIST_NAME LIKE (:BUYER_SEARCH) OR PersonNameDPEO.LIST_NAME IN (:BUYER)) AND BuyerPEO.access_action_code = 'MANAGE_PURCHASE_ORDERS' AND (BuyerPEO.prc_bu_id in (:PROCUREMENT_BU_ID)) AND BuyerPEO.allowed_flag = 'Y' AND BuyerPEO.active_flag = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 10000 order by PersonNameDPEO.LIST_NAME

SELECT   cat.Category_name,   cat.description,   cat.category_id,   cat.CATEGORY_CODE,   cat_sets.category_set_id,   dest_type.MEANING DEFAULT_DESTINATION_TYPE FROM   EGP_CATEGORIES_VL cat,   EGP_default_category_sets cat_sets,   EGP_CATEGORY_SET_VALID_CATS valid_cats,   fnd_lookup_values_vl dest_type,   FND_APPLICATION_VL apps Where   sysdate BETWEEN NVL(cat.start_date_active, sysdate -1)   AND NVL(cat.end_date_active, sysdate + 1)   AND cat.enabled_flag = 'Y'   and cat_sets.functional_area_id = 2 --PURCHASING     and cat_sets.category_set_id = valid_cats.category_set_id     and cat.category_id = valid_cats.category_id     AND (cat.Category_name LIKE (:CATEGORY_SEARCH) OR cat.Category_name IN (:CATEGORY))     AND dest_type.lookup_type = 'DESTINATION TYPE'     AND dest_type.lookup_code = 'EXPENSE'   AND dest_type.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y'   AND sysdate BETWEEN NVL(dest_type.start_date_active, sysdate-1) AND NVL(dest_type.end_date_active, sysdate+1)   AND dest_type.view_application_id = apps.application_id   AND apps.product_code = 'PO'   AND ROWNUM <= 10000   ORDER BY   cat.Category_name

SELECT   ItemPEO.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID,   ItemPEO.ITEM_NUMBER,   ItemPEO.ORGANIZATION_ID INVENTORY_ORGANIZATION_ID,   ItemPEO.DESCRIPTION,   ItemPEO.LIST_PRICE_PER_UNIT DEFAULT_PRICE,   uom.Unit_OF_MEASURE,   cat.category_name CATEGORY_NAME,   dest_type.MEANING DEFAULT_DESTINATION_TYPE FROM   EGP_SYSTEM_ITEMS_VL ItemPEO,   EGP_CATEGORIES_VL cat,   EGP_ITEM_CATEGORIES ItemCategoryPEO,   EGP_DEFAULT_CATEGORY_SETS DefaultCatalogPEO,   INV_UNITS_OF_MEASURE_VL uom,   fnd_lookup_values_vl dest_type,   FND_APPLICATION_VL apps WHERE   ItemPEO.BOM_ITEM_TYPE = 4   AND ItemPEO.ORGANIZATION_ID IN (:INVENTORY_ORGANIZATION_ID) --AND ItemPEO.ORGANIZATION_ID = 300000047274444   AND NVL(ItemPEO.OUTSIDE_PROCESS_SERVICE_FLAG, 'N') != 'Y'   AND ItemPEO.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = ItemCategoryPEO.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID   AND ItemCategoryPEO.ORGANIZATION_ID = ItemPEO.ORGANIZATION_ID   AND ItemCategoryPEO.CATEGORY_SET_ID = DefaultCatalogPEO.CATEGORY_SET_ID   and ItemCategoryPEO.category_id = cat.category_id   AND DefaultCatalogPEO.FUNCTIONAL_AREA_ID = 2   AND (     (ItemPEO.PURCHASING_ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y')     OR (       ItemPEO.SHIPPABLE_ITEM_FLAG = 'Y'       AND ItemPEO.INTERNAL_ORDER_ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y'       AND 'N' = 'Y'       AND 'N' = 'Y'     )   )   AND ItemPEO.AUTO_CREATED_CONFIG_FLAG != 'Y'   AND (     ItemPEO.item_number LIKE (:ITEM_SEARCH)     OR     ItemPEO.item_number IN (:ITEM)   )   AND ItemPEO.primary_uom_code = uom.uom_code   AND dest_type.lookup_type = 'DESTINATION TYPE'   AND dest_type.lookup_code = decode(     ItemPEO.stock_enabled_flag,     'Y',     'INVENTORY',     'EXPENSE'   )   AND dest_type.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y'   AND dest_type.view_application_id = apps.application_id   AND apps.product_code = 'PO'   AND  sysdate BETWEEN NVL(dest_type.start_date_active, sysdate-1) AND NVL(dest_type.end_date_active, sysdate+1)   AND ROWNUM <= 10000 ORDER BY   ItemPEO.ITEM_NUMBER

Rows.Notes: Not supported by the REST service
Rows.Report_SQL: SELECT distinct supplier.vendor_id, Party.PARTY_ID AS PARTY_ID, segment1 "Supplier number", Party.PARTY_NAME AS PARTY_NAME ,DECODE(count (*) over(partition by supplier.vendor_id),1, sites.vendor_site_code, null) default_site, sites.prc_bu_id PROCUREMENT_BU_ID FROM poz_suppliers supplier, HZ_PARTIES Party ,po_supplier_sites_val_v sites WHERE (Supplier.PARTY_ID = Party.PARTY_ID) AND enabled_flag = 'Y' AND sysdate BETWEEN NVL(start_date_active, sysdate-1) AND NVL(end_date_active, sysdate+1) AND sites.vendor_id = supplier.vendor_id AND (Party.PARTY_NAME LIKE(:supplier_search) OR Party.PARTY_NAME IN( :supplier )) and (sites.prc_bu_id IN (:PROCUREMENT_BU_ID)) AND ROWNUM <= 10000 ORDER BY upper(party_name)
